author: palmbeachpost
title: Hunter Hayes watches, joins restaurant singer performing his song
text:
Hunter Hayes surprised restaurant goers and a performer at a Washington, D.C. eatery over the weekend.
Maryland singer Sheen Righter started playing Hayes' "Wanted" during his set and asked Hayes to join him on the chorus, Taste of Country reported.
>> Read more trending stories
Hayes agreed, and patrons cheered as the star started performing.
He then posted the performanceto his Facebook page , saying that Righter was "killing it!!"
This dude is killing it!!
Posted by Hunter Hayes on Saturday, July 4, 2015 The two took a selfie after the song was done.
Hayes is on tour with Lady Antebellum and Sam Hunt.
